api_list.name: Hotspot VPN
api_list.description: Hotspot VPN enhances the security of your browsed data by encrypting it. The data encryption makes sure to keep no records of the internet activities online. Grab the unlimited deal with our imitable services and high-quality support.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hotspot-vpn.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hotspot-vpn.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
